name: Naga Storm
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Critical Rate by 67. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Naga Storm
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases P. Atk. by 200 on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Naga Storm
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Critical Rate by 37 when attacking a target from behind. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Tiphon's Spear
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a 25% chance of stunning a target during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Tiphon's Spear
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases the attack range. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Tiphon's Spear
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases the possibility of broadening the angle of attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Shyeed's Bow
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nAdds a 30% chance of decreasing MP consumption by 1 on a general attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Shyeed's Bow
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Shyeed's Bow
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nDecreases re-use delay by about 17%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Sobekk's Hurricane
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Atk. Spd. by 11% when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Sobekk's Hurricane
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Sobekk's Hurricane
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases the possibility of absorbing 14 HP on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Themis' Tongue
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Themis' Tongue
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Themis' Tongue
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a 20% chance of casting Focus when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Cabrio's Hand
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Cabrio's Hand
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Cabrio's Hand
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Daimon Crystal
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Daimon Crystal
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Daimon Crystal
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (D-Grade)
description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a D-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item

description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a C-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item

name: Strategy Guide
description: This book contains information about the methods and strategies used to lead a Command Channel. Use it to create a Command Channel

description: This specially processed gunpowder doesn't create smoke. It is consumed while using the swoop cannon skill
